title: Hell illuminated, or, Sancy's Roman Catholic confession wherein are such lessons, which if studiously practis'd, 'tis much to be fear'd, the Devil himself will turn Jesuit.
author: Aubign√©, Agrippa d', 1552-1630.
notes: Translation of Agrippa d'Aubigne's Confession catholique du sieur de Sancy.
Later issued under title: "The Catholik confession of Monsieur de Sancy."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
